name: (04/12) Fortress Terra
description:
Tower defense with terrain tactics. Fight off waves of enemy invaders with towers; slow them down or redirect their paths using the terrain itself.

Month 4 of 12
  • Idea
  • Retrospective

Controls

Use the mouse to move the cursor. Left click on the buttons to the right or bottom to enter build mode, left click on the map to build. Right click to exit the current build mode. Left click the bottom right button to start the next wave. Press Escape to open pause menu.

Credits

Main theme "Terra Tactics" and audio effects by Vav.

Built in Godot.
